title: Royal silver wedding
brief_description: Looks at twenty-five years of marriage of King George VI and Queen Elizabeth and describes their Silver Wedding celebrations. Narrated by Robert Donat.
description: Looks at twenty-five years of marriage of King George VI and Queen Elizabeth and describes their Silver Wedding celebrations. Narrated by Robert Donat.
